content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [taxi_db].[locations_metadata]
( 
	[row_id] [int]  NULL,
	[location] [nvarchar](255)  NULL,
	[loc_id] [int]  NULL
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = [metadata_source], LOCATION = N'locations.csv', FILE_FORMAT = [CsvFileFormat], REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO
